files.patch:
@@ -460,1 +460,1 @@
-ifneq ($(filter static-libs-bundles, $(MAKECMDGOALS)), )
+ifneq ($(filter static-libs-bundles java-static-libs-bundles, $(MAKECMDGOALS)), )
@@ -493,0 +493,1 @@
+java-static-libs-bundles: $(HOTSPOT_VARIANT_MAIN_STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS) $(STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS)
@@ -497,1 +498,1 @@
-    static-libs-bundles jcov-bundles
+    static-libs-bundles java-static-libs-bundles jcov-bundles

@@ -236,1 +236,1 @@
-HOTSPOT_VARIANT_STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS := $(addsuffix -static-libs, $(HOTSPOT_VARIANT_TARGETS))
+HOTSPOT_VARIANT_MAIN_STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS := hotspot-$(JVM_VARIANT_MAIN)-static-libs
@@ -310,1 +310,1 @@
-    $(HOTSPOT_VARIANT_LIBS_TARGETS) $(HOTSPOT_VARIANT_STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS)
+    $(HOTSPOT_VARIANT_LIBS_TARGETS) $(HOTSPOT_VARIANT_MAIN_STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS)
@@ -476,0 +476,4 @@
+$(eval $(call SetupTarget, java-static-libs-image, \
+    MAKEFILE := StaticJvmLibsImage, \
+))
+
@@ -848,0 +852,6 @@
+$(eval $(call SetupTarget, java-static-libs-bundles, \
+    MAKEFILE := Bundles, \
+    TARGET := java-static-libs-bundles, \
+    DEPS := java-static-libs-image, \
+))
+
@@ -901,1 +911,0 @@
-      $(eval hotspot-$v-static-libs: hotspot-$v-gensrc java.base-copy) \
@@ -904,0 +913,2 @@
+  hotspot-$(JVM_VARIANT_MAIN)-static-libs: hotspot-$(JVM_VARIANT_MAIN)-gensrc java.base-copy
+
@@ -1060,1 +1071,3 @@
-  static-libs-image: hotspot-static-libs $(STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS)
+  static-libs-image: $(STATIC_LIBS_TARGETS)
+
+  java-static-libs-image: hotspot-static-libs static-libs-image
@@ -1272,1 +1285,1 @@
-all-bundles: product-bundles test-bundles docs-bundles static-libs-bundles
+all-bundles: product-bundles test-bundles docs-bundles static-libs-bundles java-static-libs-bundles

@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+#
+# Copyright (c) 2023 Google Inc. All rights reserved.
+# DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
+#
+# This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
+# under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
+# published by the Free Software Foundation.  Oracle designates this
+# particular file as subject to the "Classpath" exception as provided
+# by Oracle in the LICENSE file that accompanied this code.
+#
+# This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
+# ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
+# FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
+# version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
+# accompanied this code).
+#
+# You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
+# 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
+# Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
+#
+# Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
+# or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
+# questions.
+#
+
+# This makefile creates an image of the optional static version of Hotspot 
+# JVM library.
+
+default: all
+
+include $(SPEC)
+include MakeBase.gmk
+
+################################################################################
+
+TARGETS :=
+
+$(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_STATIC_LIBS_libjvm, \
+    SRC := $(HOTSPOT_OUTPUTDIR)/variant-$(JVM_VARIANT_MAIN)/libjvm/objs/static, \
+    DEST := $(STATIC_LIBS_IMAGE_DIR)/lib, \
+    FILES := $(wildcard $(HOTSPOT_OUTPUTDIR)/variant-$(JVM_VARIANT_MAIN)/libjvm/objs/static/*$(STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX)), \
+))
+TARGETS += $(COPY_STATIC_LIBS_libjvm)
+
+################################################################################
+
+all: $(TARGETS)
+
+.PHONY: all
